title: HPI 51 - Change of Mind - Vasubandhu and Yogacara Buddhism
itunes:title: HPI 51 - Change of Mind - Vasubandhu and Yogacara Buddhism
description: Vasubandhu’s path to Yogācāra Buddhism, a form of idealism which holds that nothing can be mind-independent.
